item.title: Version 1.2.18 (Build 20260108)
item.description:
What's New

feat: Add custom undo typing hotkey and improve debug window management

  • Add support for custom undo typing hotkey (not just Esc) including modifier-only hotkeys like Ctrl+Shift
  • Auto-disable debug mode when debug window is closed via title bar
  • Add debug window toggle in status bar menu
  • Move IMKit Mode settings from Advanced tab to Input Sources tab
  • Reorganize Input Sources section with tabs for better organization
  • Fix flagsChanged event handling to not reset engine (preserves undo buffer for modifier-only hotkeys)
